.. _`Introduction`:

Introduction
============
This repository contains the code for the CMPT-221 applications worked on during the Fall 2024 semester.
It contains the code for the final project, in the form of 10 labs. Each lab has its own requirements/directions
and a venv in order to complete some part of the final project.

Documentation
-------------
* `Document Page`_

.. _Document Page: https://domgloede.github.io/CMPT-221/
